name: Five Nights at Prototype Fredbear's
description: ---Credits---  The sfm models and sounds don't belong to me. Please don't assume they do  JosephTheSnail  (the creator)  golden bon#4277 (ideas and being a co creator)  WwwWario  (For allowing me to add an Easter egg and making FNaW, and inspiration) scott cawthon  (for making fnaf and being the inspiration)  ---About---  This game is based off of Scott Cawthon's most successful game series & my role-plays on other social media!  Hello, welcome to fredbears! A magical place for everyone who wants to bring smiles to children with the local singing animatronics (Prototype Fredbear, Lolbit, Springbonnie, and Bonnet) and a few characters!  ---Story---  Since a year ago.  The Diner was shutdown due to the tragic events  they decided to open it back up. you work at the diner as the nightguard ("Joseph") One of the owners of Fredbear & Friends. The old location.  ---Characters---  Prototype Fredbear  Springbonnie  Lolbit  Bonnet  Jack  Shadow Fredbear  Shadow Lolbit  ---Date---  Game since January, 20 2021
